name: Tanks Chase - Labyrinth War 3D
description:
You were sent to sound out the situation into the strange dangerous maze and find out that enemy tanks occupied this territory. There is no time for waiting for help, so your only chance to survive is to fight alone against enemy army. Tanks Chase – Labyrinth War 3D – being extremely addictive, this game will keep you on tenterhooks!

Your main goal is to shoot all the enemies and dodge their shots. Drive your tank, explore the labyrinth, control your health indicator. We wish you good luck in this blitz campaign!

Tanks Chase – Labyrinth War 3D game features:
• Different levels with a lot of enemies;
• Stunning gameplay – you'll need all your reaction skills;
• Unusual beautiful graphics;
• Popular tank war game genre;
• Explore the maze and hide from other tanks;
• Cool shooting sounds.

Tanks Chase – Labyrinth War 3D - now you are not only player, you are brave soldier and wise captain. Win this war and become a hero! Survive maze battle – defeat your opponents in the iron tanks war!
